StoryText: I'm hanging out with %FullName:NPC:1% and %Pron:1:2% friends and one of them says something and they all laugh.
Question: I laugh too but they tell me it was an inside joke. What do I say?

OptionText.Text: "It just reminded me of an inside joke I have with my friends."
"Oh, I thought you said something else."
"I wasn't laughing. That's how I cough."

OptionResult.Result: They all don't believe me and %FullName:NPC:1% becomes embarrassed by me.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: I just looked like I was trying too hard in front of everyone. And %FullName:NPC:1% was definitely embarrassed by me in front of %Pron:1:2% friends. I feel so stupid. I definitely was trying too hard!

I was definitely trying too hard at first but after that I kind of relax and ease it up. Thank goodness for my quick thinking. After that I'm more relaxed and have a good time with %FullName:NPC:1% and %Pron:1:2% friends.

OptionResult.Result: They ask me what I thought they said and  can't think of anything!
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: Once I can't think of anything to follow that "Brilliant" statement up, they all start laughing at me because it's apparent I was just trying too hard. %FullName:NPC:1% is embarrassed by me and all %Pron:1:2% friends are making fun of me to everyone else.

OptionResult.Result: They all think this is a joke and start cracking up and tell me I'm hilarious!
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: Wow! Not only did I save myself from embarrassment but I actually earned myself a lot of "cool points." Wait, do cool people say that? Regardless, %FullName:NPC:1% and %Pron:1:2% friends think I am hilarious now.
